description: This source file is a minimal HTTP client wrapper for handling API requests using fetch. It provides functions to build request options, parse responses, manage timeouts, and perform HTTP requests with support for URL parameters and error handling.

methods.name: buildInit(method = 'GET', body, headers = {})
methods.description: Constructs a fetch RequestInit object with default headers and method, merges in provided headers and body, handling JSON content type appropriately.

methods.name: parseResponse(res)
methods.description: Attempts to parse the fetch response as JSON; falls back to text or null if parsing fails.

methods.name: createTimeoutSignal(ms)
methods.description: Creates an AbortController signal with a timeout for request cancellation.

methods.name: request(url, options = {})
methods.description: Performs an HTTP request relative to a base API URL or as an absolute URL, supporting query parameters, custom headers, timeout, and error handling.
